backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature requirement tied to App.tsx, defining questionnaire behavior and code buttons.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including styling, Tailwind config, and App.tsx behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and dark mode definitions with global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell defining the root element and loading the React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI with questionnaire flow that reveals a final button and three code buttons when both answers are yes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Alternate Tailwind variable theme with neon‑green dungeon aesthetic and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap wiring React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for a website called Troll Tower 6 Codes, including features for a Get Codes button, a two‑question yes/no flow, conditional code reveal, and thematic styling. Also lists pending feature requests and metadata such as schema and version info.
